name: This website
description: Repository holding this website's code. I am proud of the dynamic content loading from json files, which allows me to easily change most of the content of the website without touching the html itself

name: Arch Quick Setup
description: Some scripts and files to make setting up arch on a fresh install just the way I like like it simple and easy, with just a few simple strokes and key presses. Constant WIP.

name: NCGM's Website
description: Website of the Nucleus of Computer Graphics and Multimedia (NCGM)

name: Atlas of Anatomical Pathology
description: An online Atlas of Anatomical Pathology. An educative tool made for a Veterinary Medicine University teacher.

name: FEUP Hell
description: Preliminary project developed for the 2023 edition of the Game Design and Development class of M.EIC.

name: Library Tracker
description: Command line utility I made to track my card collection. Allows adding cards to a collection, removing them, editing, etc.. Additionally, this program fetches prices for Yu-Gi-Oh cards in the collection from cardmarket.

name: SRT Editor
description: Simple srt file editing tool created to aid me in my manual modification (and occasional creation) of subtitle files.

name: Pibox Quick Setup
description: Some scripts and files to make setting up my raspberry pi emulation session on a fresh install.

name: Magic: the Gathering (and Processing of Information)
description: Repository for the project of the PRI class of the year 2022/2023. We retrieved data, indexed it, and developed a search system for Magic: the Gathering cards.

name: [] Invaders
description: Repository for MIEIC's LCOM class of the year 2020/2021. Contains the lab assignments and my final project project for the class, a clone of the classic Space Invaders.
